verbs.description: [ARG0: hawks] [V: drop] [ARG1: exhibition game] [ARG4: to grizzlies] the hawks dropped a 120 - 110 decision to the grizzlies friday night in an exhibition game in memphis tyler dorsey alex poythress alex len trae young marc gasol flu - like grizzlies memphis grizzlies flu like atlanta kent bazemore taurean prince memphis hawks deandre bembry
